title: Yesterday (Beatles song)
summary: "Yesterday" is a song by the English band the Beatles, written by Paul McCartney and credited to Lennonâ€“McCartney. It was first released on the album Help! in August 1965, except in the United States, where it was issued as a single in September. The song reached number one on the US charts. It subsequently appeared on the UK EP Yesterday in March 1966 and made its US album debut on Yesterday and Today, in June 1966.
